articles.description: Shares of Tata Chemicals hit lower circuit as Tata Group tries to avoid Tata Sons IPO. Tata Investment Corporation joins after rally. Tata Sons explores restructuring options to avoid getting listed.
articles.content: Shares of Tata Chemicals, which rallied 36% in the last 4 trading sessions, hit the 10% lower circuit limit at Rs 1,183.45 on BSE in Mondays trade as the Tata Group is said to be trying to avoid the … [+2542 chars]
